name: One Man Staff
description:
You are responsible for the security procedure in Bicity Airport.

One Man Staff is a game about multitasking. Your job is simple: Deny access to people carrying forbidden items to the terminal. Keeping track of the different passengers can be challenging, and you quickly feel out of control.

This game was created by Jakob Frank Mogensen and Michael Wit Dolatko during GMTK gamejam 2020. All code, art and music was made during the 48 hours.
